response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you personally. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your appreciation for the product's true worth. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
